definitions: The action of crouching or sitting with one's knees bent and one's heels close to or touching one's buttocks or the back of one's thighs.
The occupation of an empty building or land without the owner's permission.
A position assumed in weightlifting or exercise where one lowers the hips from a standing position and then stands back up.
examples: He was squatting by the fire.
The group was involved in squatting.
She performed a deep squatting exercise.
